No Score Hardcore Class Apps

No score hardcore description

The games made as a part of the advanced Interaction course led by Gaël Hugo assisted by Tibor Udvari and Laura Perrenoud.

Projects

Flow Particles

Description
Flow Particles is a game inspired by the laws of electromagnetism. By changing the electromagnetic field, try to aim the particles toward the receptors.
Created by
Pietro Alberti


Ditto Fellow

Description
Ditto Fellow is a minimal looking game with simple interactions based on your observation skills. It displays a grid of elements in which you have to find the fellow one following the same motion pattern as the indicator. As you complete levels, the difficulty will increase with more error possibilities and more complex movements.
Created by
Aloïs Geiser


Bolas Bolas

Description
Drag the moving circles inside their corresponding corners. Don't trust your brain.
Created by
Andrea Ramirez Aburto
